nodes.text: A Bunkurd Reclamation System was a type of sewer system. It was in use in the few parts of Mos Eisley that had sewer systems around the time of the Galactic Civil War. The old, broken-down, and leaky state of Mos Eisley's Bunkurd Sewer Systems caused Falynn Sandskimmer to contract Bunkurd Sewer Disorder at some time when she lived on Tatooine.
